column4: Can someone help? I installed Ubuntu 9.04 on an Acer Aspire 3641wxmi laptop and I'm not getting any sound
this is a common issue, try first adusting the volume. if nothing plug in headphones and see if you have sound.
I tried adjusting the volume already. I'll try headphones and let you know
Headphones work. Why wouldn't the speakers work?
no idea. i have two laptops, one works the other doesnt
So it just may be that I wont be able to use internal speakers?
thats been my experince. and i have tried getting it to work and have never been able to make it
what did you to get it to work?
add line to bottom and save... options snd-hda-intel model=acer-aspire
restart and you should have sound!!
my laptop is not an acer, but ill give it a try
